# ERC721标准接口

## 简介
```
erc721的标准接口
erc721是非同质化代币,每个token独一无二,不可分割
```

## 交易接口

#### 1.转账
```JavaScript
    function transferFrom(
        address from,
        address to,
        uint256 tokenId
    ) external;

    入参:
        from: 转出地址
        to: 转入地址
        tokenId: tokenId
```

#### 2.安全转账(防黑洞)
```JavaScript
    function safeTransferFrom(
        address from,
        address to,
        uint256 tokenId
    ) external;
    说明: 本方法功能与'transferFrom()'方法一样, 但对'to'地址进行了校验,确保'to'地址为合约地址时有转出功能, 防止将token转入黑洞地址

    入参:
        from: 转出地址
        to: 转入地址
        tokenId: tokenId
```

#### 3.授权/取消授权
```JavaScript
    function setApprovalForAll(address operator, bool approved) external;

    入参:
        operator: 授权目标地址
        approved: 是否授权
```

## 查询接口

#### 1.查询名称
```JavaScript
    function name() external view returns(string memory);

    返回:
        1. string: 全称
```

#### 2.查询简称/代号
```JavaScript
    function symbol() external view returns(string memory);

    返回:
        1. string: 简称
```

#### 3.查询现有铸造量
```JavaScript
    function totalSupply() external view returns(uint256);

    返回:
        1. uint256: 现有铸造量
```

#### 4.查询元数据uri
```JavaScript
    function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (string memory);

    入参:
        id: tokenId
    返回: 
        1. string: 元数据uri
```

#### 5.查询余额
```JavaScript
    function balanceOf(address account) external view returns (uint256);

    入参:
        account: 要查询的钱包地址
    返回:
        1. uint256: 余额
```

#### 6.是否已授权
```JavaScript
    function isApprovedForAll(address account, address operator) external view returns (bool);

    入参:
        account: token持有地址
        operator: 授权目标
    返回:
        1. bool: account是否将token全部授权给operator
```
